column3: Set the lightcurve bin size in seconds, default is 1 day.
Fix all background parameters before starting the fit. If False then any parameters that are currently free in the model will be fit simultaneously with the source of interest.

Free normalizations of background sources within this angular distance in degrees from the source of interest.  If None then no sources will be freed.  Note that this parameter supersedes `fix_background`.
List of sources to be freed.  These sources will be added to the list of sources satisfying the free_radius selection.
Set the number of lightcurve bins.  The total time range will be evenly split into this number of time bins.
Set the lightcurve bin edge sequence in MET.  This option takes precedence over binsz and nbins.
